title: (25300) Tàrrega - Carrer de Joan Tous

title: (25330) Vilagrassa - 22 Carrer del Nord
description: Parking next to the new swimming pools and sports area. Ideal for strolling through the old walls, an illuminated walk and to see the Tower of Pisa by L Urgell. The slope of the tower is spectacular, especially if you look at it from the town hall or from the road, when you approach it loses the spectacularity of the slope.

title: (25340) Verdú - 367 Partida Planes
description:
Font de Santa Magdalena, Verdú herriaren ondoan. Mahasti artean, aintzinako harrizko mahai batzuk ba daude baina ez oso erabilgarriak, nahiz eta xarma eduki. Bear lasaia izan behar du nahiz eta niri stop bat "lagun" suertatu (goizaldean parrandazale gazteak eta goizean ehiztari batzuk). Bestela bear gomendagarria. Bertoko batek ur hau edatea gomendagarria ez omen dala dioste.

Very quiet shady site. Lots of mosquitoes and flies. There is no source.

04/02/2023 It is quite neglected, but for a quiet night it is worth it. You can hear the bell tower the quarters, half, three quarters and the hours, for us it was not a problem, in the end we slept well.

title: (25340) Verdú - 28 Carrer de la Bassa
description: Large dirt parking at the entrance of this beautiful town. Very easy access for large ac. title: (25320) Anglesola - 8 Carrer Esports

Lively town with bars, shops and good bakery patisseries. Nice church square with vestiges of the castle. And many routes on foot or mountain bike. The route through the 4 Peixeres, typical pools of L Urgell, along the Ondara river is signposted. Museo del Carro and Cal Gassol museum.

title: (25320) Anglesola - 8 Carrer Esports

Parking

Small village with a bar where is possible to eat the best bbq meat.

Let us respect the environment so that we are well received wherever we go

title: (25341) Guimerà - Unnamed Road
description: Santuari of the Bovera. It has a barbecue area and WC with prior reservation. Impressive viewpoint with views of the Pyrenees and Urgell. Great area to park. Access by wide dirt road and in good condition.

title: (25250) Bellpuig - Unnamed Road
description: Bellpuig motorcycle circuit parking. There are no services, but very spacious to spend the night if you are on the road.

title: (25331) Tornabous - 12 Carrer Ronda del Nord
description: Parking of the Parc del Reguer, a park with grass, picnic tables and great playgrounds next to the Reguer stream. By bike or walking from there, there are less than 2 km to the Iberian town Molí del Espígol, very cool to see, on a path full of pear trees. Nearby, if you look out over the Agramunt road, you will see a huge tree among the pear trees, on the left side, it is the banana tree declared by the Generalitat as monumental of Tornabousde, 4 m in diameter from its trail. It is also mandatory to go to the social bar of the old cinema that still works, being one of the 43 that are open in Spain with a theater. In homage to his 75th birthday at C 53 you will see the mural and next to it, recommended fruit from km0.

title: (25263) Preixana - Unnamed Road
description: Motorhome area of the Ermita Montalbà. Preixana Large parking (max 48h). Water and emptying. Point of Light, which will become operational soon. WC under the point of view of the Hermitage (It is necessary to ask for the key at the municipal bar, next to the square). Barbecues and tables (ask permission at the bar). Access a bit tricky in case of rain, for large motorhomes (rise of land). Book barbecues and toilets. Built by the city council, with the help of neighbors; All an example to follow.

title: (25341) Ciutadilla - 51 Carrer Sant Roc

title: (25200) Cervera - Cami del Cementiri

title: (25250) Bellpuig - 35 Carreró del Call

The carrot cake was also the best we've ever had! And all at an unbeatable price!

title_short: (25215) Sant Ramon - 25 Avinguda de la Font
description: Ideal parking to rest one night in the middle of the route. Quiet place, a few meters from the main road, in summer there are swimming pools and also paddle tennis, you can find a parked car. Bar 50 meters. Do not use the ?️ for garbage from the motorhome, behind the sports center they have containers for recycling ♻️. Gas station ⛽ at the entrance of the town, with approximate hours from 9 a.m. to 9 p.m. Respect the place.

title: (25317) La Donzell - 2 Carrer de l'Empedrat
description: Medieval walled town, very quiet, in the hermitage we find a picnic area, with water, perfect for walking or cycling routes, full of tracks that take us to villages and houses, some abandoned, in the middle of nature surrounded by oak trees and cereal cultivation, in beautiful spring, from there we can visit Agramunt, there is a track from La Donzell to Agramunt of 5 km. Ideal by bike, walking a 50-minute walk, in Agramunt there is the Vicens turron factory, a Roman church worth visiting and porch streets.

title: (25317) Agramunt - 40 Partida Cami Doncell
description: Two barbecues, a large stone table, children's play area ... an ideal place to rest ... pets are allowed

title: (25230) Mollerussa - 52 Carrer de Sant Joan
description: Day and night parking in Mollerussa with easy access to the A2, 100m from Mercadona and 10 'walk to the city center. Bar and Repsol gas station 50m. With afternoon shade. (watch out !! dog poop)

title: (43412) Solivella - 118 Carretera de Montblanc a Artesa
title_short: (43412) Solivella - 118 Carretera de Montblanc a Artesa

There is a village water tap and recycling bins on opposite side of the road by a small pay park or another water point marked down road on park4night.

title: (43412) Solivella - 80 Carretera de Montblanc-Artesa
description: Just a water point. Parking of last resort !!

title: (25140) Arbeca - 28 Carrer Empordà
description: Cheap laundry and gas station

description: Free covered parking. There are no services, but just in front is the service area, a bakery, a hostel and two gas stations.

title: (08717) La Panadella - 10 Carretera Nacional II
description: Large area to park all types of vehicles equipped with children's area, bar / restaurant, gas station and large toilets

title: (43412) Solivella - 26 Carrer Garcia Salado
description: Parking inside the town but away from the urban area. It is wide and flat, with some shade and very quiet. It is marked as a parking lot for a nearby restaurant but it is used openly. The town is very quiet and offers a sense of security. There is a bakery, grocery store and a bar/restaurant. It is very nice but you can hear the bell tower 24 hours a day, every 15 minutes. We have spent two nights and no problem.

title: (25140) Arbeca - Unnamed Road
description: Nice agricultural family farm, with vineyards, where they allow overnight, water supply and emptying of gray and black. Beautiful place, and both Maria José the owner and Xabier were super friendly at all times. I wish that those of us who visit the place live up to it. The products for sale in the store give off the same good feeling of affection as their creators. Long life for VINYA ELS VILARS

title: (25616) Montgai - 30 Avinguda de la Generalitat
description: Quiet and free ground parking

title: (25616) Montgai - 12 Carrer del Calvari
description: Himalaya is a cozy area for campers located in the province of Lérida, it has beautiful facilities which consist of a terrace with views, a place accommodated for its visitors and parking for your vehicle which is allowed a maximum length of 6 meters, it also has services such as water, electricity and gas at no additional cost. And the most fun thing is that in the facilities there is a 4-walled recodrome with a gym, activities and showers! The price of accommodation is €5 per night. It should be noted that bike carrier services are offered. We hope to see you soon here camper. Regards, we add that in the summer facilities of the rocòdrom they are cool since the walls are made of 35, 40 cm stone, we will try to ensure that they are well cared for, thank you campers. On the weekend of August 18, 19, 20 in the Himalayas, the following activities will be carried out, indicated on the poster in the image gallery of our welcoming profile. To go to the facilities that weekend, it is necessary to register in advance by calling or contacting through Instagram

title: (25244) Fondarella - 66 Partida Cm Bellvis
description: Large car park for the night, quiet, in front of the cemetery. You can also park there to walk and stretch your legs.

title: (25412) Omellóns - LV-2012
description: Located in the town of Omellons, enjoy the best views of the town, where you will find the services of a bakery, bar, grocery store and sports institutions with a saltwater pool in summer. Parking and overnight between olive trees, almond trees and aromatic herbs that make this territory ideal for practicing road, mountain and hiking biking, discovering paths and trails between dry stone huts typical of the area or discovering our farmers and livestock. Welcome to Omellons.

title: (43426) Rocafort de Queralt - 35 C-241d
description: Super quiet parking beautiful view of the village water barbecue ... very quiet.

title: (25270) Sant Guim de Freixenet - 6 Carrer Nou
title_short: (25270) Sant Guim de Freixenet - 6 Carrer Nou
description: Lloc tranquil to pass a nit, with a font at the coast dins the bosc that hi has. recomanable molt.

title: (25337) Bellcaire d'Urgell - 109 Avinguda 11 de Setembre
description: Large parking area day and night very quiet and in the center of town. Without services but with access to very close bars and shops. Ideal to make a stop and rest before continuing towards the Pyrenees.

title: (25616) Montgai - LV-3025
description: Rest area next to the road

title: (25411) Fulleda - 17 Avinguda d'Agustina Saragossa i Domènech
title_short: (25411) Fulleda - 17 Avinguda d'Agustina Saragossa i Domènech
description:
Peaceful city where rest, walk or make the itineraries in MTB. There is the nearby cellar Matallonga, where you can visit and taste your wine. Municipal swimming pool and playground for children on the shore.
48 hours maximum.

title: (25270) Sant Guim de Freixenet - 24 Carrer Antoni Gaudí
title_short: (25270) Sant Guim de Freixenet - 24 Carrer Antoni Gaudí

title: (25242) Miralcamp -
description: Miralcamp viewpoint. Away from the town. Parking next to a wide dirt road with easy access.

title: (25317) Montclar - 38 Carrer de Montclar
description: Park at the entrance to the village next to the scale. Beautiful town with beautiful panoramic views and castle with guided tours on Sunday mornings and they make scapes rooms for people over 10 years old, very good plan! There is also the path through the Sierra de Montclar with the Canal de L Urgell mine as a curiosity.

title: (43428) Les Piles - 2 Carrer Major
description: Parking near the center of this beautiful town, Les Piles de Gaià. Super quiet space.

title: (43411) Blancafort - 17 Avinguda Onze de Setembre
description: Picnic area, with tables, barbecues and a fountain. There are swings for children. There is a bar and a public pool in summer. Very quiet place.

title: (43420) Santa Coloma de Queralt - 68 Carrer Llorac
title_short: (43420) Santa Coloma de Queralt - 68 Carrer Llorac
description: Great place! And the town below it is amazing! You must walk into it. Nice drive off highway as well from Barcelona! Locals said they never see anyone there so it would always be empty! Highly recommend however no close toilets!

title: (43420) Santa Coloma de Queralt - 8 Carrer Francesc Macia
title_short: (43420) Santa Coloma de Queralt - 8 Carrer Francesc Macia

title: (43411) Blancafort - TV-2337
description: Quiet place next to the road. I have spent a very quiet night.

description: Rural road, for several AC, without services, there is a lake and good views, good AC access.

title: (43420) Santa Coloma de Queralt - 48 Carrer de les Flors
title_short: (43420) Santa Coloma de Queralt - 48 Carrer de les Flors
description: Public parking with views of a charming town. The visit is highly recommended: monuments, gastronomy, its people ...

title: (43429) Les Piles - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic area in the hermitage of Figuerola.

title: (43422) Ollers - 2 Passeig Moreres
description: Quiet viewpoint with parking spaces with good views. Somewhat narrow access. Large caravans not recommended.

title: (43424) Sarral - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet car park overlooking Sarral. About 10 picnic tables under the trees. Barbeque available. Trash containers. (Closed during my visit, water tap and a restaurant 100m away.) Games for children. Access to CC, van and Caravan.

title: (25222) Sidamon - 2 Carrer Àngel Guimerà
description: Parking for motorhomes free with fountain and children's area. Next to the NII next to a quiet residential area.

title: (08717) Argençola - BV-2231

title: (43423) Pira - 10 Carrer Cèsar Martinell
description: Parking for trucks but no problem to park, has little use of trucks. 2 minutes from the town center and possible routes. No services

title: (43410) Montblanc - C-14
description: Aire on restaurant. Room closed at night. Free if you eat in the restaurant. Very nice welcome, farm products for sale and served at the table.

title: (25222) Sidamon - Autovia del Nord-Est
description: Small service area with gas station, restaurant, small play area with some picnic tables. Large parking lot with some shadows.

title: (25739) El Gos - Unnamed Road
description: Flat place for 2-3 campers without any service overlooking two ruins. Just stopped for a dog walk. The nearby C 14 can be heard. It's probably pretty quiet at night though.

title: (25400) Les Borges Blanques - 56 Avinguda de Francesc Macià
title_short: (25400) Les Borges Blanques - 56 Avinguda de Francesc Macià

title: (25480) Tarrés - 162 Carrer Montserrat
description:
Area created by the city council of Tarrés in the summer of 2020. Very quiet and with excellent free services. In the summer there is a swimming pool. Highlight the BTT routes and also hikes they are worth it.
Chemical cassette emptying and a toilet in the small building next to the water tap.

title: (25400) Les Borges Blanques - 24 Avinguda de la Sardana
title_short: (25400) Les Borges Blanques - 24 Avinguda de la Sardana

title_short: (25400) Les Borges Blanques - 26 Passeig del Terrall
description: Day parking and pretty park, with shade and bench to be able to eat. Refreshing in the summer. Parking for large cc is 5 minutes away. A small supermarket 30 seconds away.

title: (25617) La Sentiu de Sió - 101 Carrer la Solana
title_short: (25617) La Sentiu de Sió - 101 Carrer la Solana
description: Super quiet place to spend the night. Very recommendable. Access to a slightly difficult climb, a CC can have difficulties.

title: (25430) Juneda -
description: EcoCentre Les Obagues. Educational space with ample parking to spend the night. Access to the bathroom, WC and cafe. You can visit the region, the animals, etc. 500 meters from the town of Juneda and 20 km from Lleida Call ahead to book parking

title: (25737) Foradada - 30 Carrer de Sant Urbà

title_short: (43422) Barberà de la Conca - 40 Carrer del Comerç

Cemetery car park
no services .

title: (08717) Argençola - Unnamed Road
description: 2km from the A2 motorway, Barcelona-Lleida, correct track that climbs 1.5km. Then it's green and quiet. No service but pines and birds.

title: (25617) La Sentiu de Sió -
description: Parking near the town. Very quiet place. Water source in the village 1 minute away.

title_short: (43440) L'Espluga de Francolí - 3 Camí dels Horts
description: Esplanade of land without elevation or services. In the shade thanks to the trees there. They build a picnic area with a water point. 2 minutes walk from the Coves de l'Espluga, highly recommended.

title_short: (25730) Artesa de Segre - 106 Carretera de Montsonís

title: (25430) Juneda - 6 Carrer del Canal d'Urgell
description: Juneda sports area car park, right next to the Urgell canal. Quiet and perfect place to spend a night, make excursions by bike or on foot along the canal and a short visit to the town with a medieval past.

title: (08283) Castellfollit de Riubregós - 47 Carrer Raval
description: Good place to spend a night, next to a playground and some tennis courts but with the mountain in sight when you open the door. Half away from town, without disturbing people. Grass and cement ground to parts

title: (25400) Les Borges Blanques - 135 Diseminado Poligon 10
description: Space next to the chapel. Train. Quiet for the rest. A few kilometres from Borges Blanques. Picnic area.. Barbecues, etc..

title: (25440) Vinaixa - 92A Carretera de Lleida
description: Free rest area for AC and vans. 16 places with electricity and water but you can park much more. As soon as you enter the town, you will see the signs. It is a quiet place, with electricity, water, gray and black water evacuation. Next to it there is a picnic area with tables and barbecues. There is a free tennis court and racquetball court. In summer, there is the municipal swimming pool with a bar, WC and showers. There is also a park for the little ones. In the town there is a bakery, a butcher and to buy a little of everything, a bar and an ATM. From the same town there are different hiking or mountain biking routes through the protected area of "La Vall de Vinaixa" that can be downloaded through Wikiloc on the profile (Associació esportiva Vinaixa), on the information panels or by requesting information directly from the City Council.

title: (43440) L'Espluga de Francolí - 10 Carrer del Serè
title_short: (43440) L'Espluga de Francolí - 10 Carrer del Serè
description: Parking stadium, quiet place to spend the night on a flat ground

title: (43421) Bellprat - B-2201
description: Parking davant of the town of Bellprat. Asphalted and quiet area, prop of the nature and the Castell de Queralt.

title: (08283) Castellfollit de Riubregós - 2 Carrer Escorrals
description: Parking at the entrance of the Castellfolit de Riubregós. To spend the night and visit the castle.

title: (25750) Torà - 7 Carrer dels Rosers

title: (43430) Vimbodí - 17 Carrer de l'Església
description: Ample parking. Close to Museu del Vidre and a few km from the Poblet Monastery. You can spend the night. Vimbodí is a very quiet town.

description:
FORMATGERIA AUBAGUETA A herd of 300 goats offer us excellent milk. Experiences: Taking care of the herd. Milk production process. Cheese production. Tasting and sale KM0. 
It is not allowed to come with animals.

description: Park with swings for children, with 5 wooden tables, a fountain with water, litter bin, benches...

description: Station with cheap gas, good services for a stop for breakfast, lunch or dinner. It has a supermarket, a restaurant, water and swings. Possible night

good views

Puedes pernoctar sin problema mucha sombra y tranquilidad. Del centro de ocio a 6 minutos andando.

title_short: (43421) Santa Perpètua de Gaià - 11 Cami de la Font

title: (43400) Montblanc - Camí del Cementeri

title: (25220) Bell-lloc d'Urgell - 7 Carrer Estació
description: Very peaceful place, maybe a little isolated, I spent two dream nights

title: (43400) Montblanc - 51 Raval Santa Anna
description: Large parking lot Excellent for motorhomes. No problems of space, height or overnight. a few meters from the historic center. Very quiet and safe. 100% recommendable.

title: (25220) Bell-lloc d'Urgell - Unnamed Road
description: Parking with views of Bell-lloc and the flat (on a good day you can see the Pyrenees perfectly), 50 meters from the municipal pine forest, where there are barbecues and large tables. There are garbage containers.

title: (25450) L'Albi - 13 Avinguda de les Garrigues
description:
Free seating area for AC or vans. Direct access AP2 exit 8, 3km from the N240. Pleasant setting in a pine forest with picnic tables and barbecue area. Fountain with drinking water and area for motorhome supplies: electricity connection, wi-fi, water and discharge of gray and black water. Ideal in summer next to the municipal swimming pool with WC, showers and bar. Close to sports area with paddle tennis courts. Maximum time in area with light 72 hours.
Local product stores: bakery, grocery stores, various product stores, bar, restaurant, pharmacy, doctor's office, hairdressers, tobacconist, etc. In the town they also have access to several ATMs, mechanical workshops, car wash... There are also parks for the little ones.

title: (25740) Ponts - 1 Plaça Anton Castellà
description: New laundry near Ponts area

title: (43811) Cabra del Campo - TP-2311
description: Picnic area with 2 tables and benches, in the sports center of the town. Very large esplanade for parking on site. Very quiet area

title: (25747) Ponts - Unnamed Road
description: At the end of a small street, very quiet in front of the river. Only small vans, not camping car !!

title: (43400) Montblanc - 42 Baluard de Santa Anna
description: Land wasteland next to a municipal parking lot. Quiet place for about 10 AC. No shade, just a few cypress trees that shade an AC or two in the morning. A 5-minute walk from the walled enclosure. We have been well and with good views to the north.

title: (43400) Montblanc - 4 Camí de la Parellada
description: Clay road parking at the foot of the ramparts, presence of water fountain

title: (43400) Montblanc - 54 Muralla de Santa Tecla
description: At the Tourist Information Office? they told us to park at the back of the building. Really great to visit Montblanc, no service

title: (43400) Montblanc - 22 Carrer Pujada de la Serra
title_short: (43400) Montblanc - 22 Carrer Pujada de la Serra
description: Parking at the foot of the ramparts, less crowded than the one below. Passeig de josep Conangla. Slightly sloping.

title: (43448) Poblet - 11 T-700
description: Simple roadside parking, opposite Poblet Monastery. Fountain below the monastery towards the crossroads of the T700 and the T7002 for the full of water.

title: (25740) Ponts - 95 Carretera de La Seu d'Urgell
title_short: (25740) Ponts - 95 Carretera de La Seu d'Urgell
